messages.subject: Artifacts and Scrolls
messages.msgSnippet: Have created 2 new folders in the SHQ s Photos section-- Artifacts and Historical Documents . I ve found a whole bunch of amazing stuff in the last 24
messages.messageBody:
Have created 2 new folders in the SHQ's "Photos" section-- "Artifacts" and
"Historical Documents". I've found a whole bunch of amazing stuff in the
last 24 hours-- from the cover of an anthology of Hijikata's poetry to the
leaves used in Ishida powder, so please check it out!

--Masayoshi
